title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.227 - Quick asset
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.227 - Quick asset

State Regulations
A current asset normally convertible into cash within a
relatively short period, such as a month. Examples: cash, call loan, marketable
security, customer's account, a commodity immediately salable at quoted prices
on the open market. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.227

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
